DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Deficiency Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Compared Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: In study , measure vitamin D level patient chronic Hepatitis C healthy individual . This study important ass vitamin D inadequacy patient chronic Hepatitis C healthy individual area .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Study Group : Men woman age 25 55 Diagnosis chronic hepatitis C Exclusion Criteria Study Group : Taking vitamin D supplement ( part multivitamin ) , calcium supplement and/or biphosphonates Has acute hepatitis C infection Has chronic hepatitis B infection Had gastric bypass surgery Has chronic kidney disease Inclusion Criteria Control Group : Men woman age 20 60 Has body mass index ( BMI ) 20 35 Exclusion Criteria Study Group : Taking vitamin D supplement ( part multivitamin ) , calcium supplement and/or biphosphonates Has significant illness medical problem control control medication History hepatitis abnormal liver chemistry test History intravenous drug use
